mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_SM_NOTIFY_HIS (ID, MOBILE, SEND_MSG, SEND_STATUS, RET_MSG, SM_CHANNEL_TYPE,CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, OPERATOR,SM_SOURCE) VALUES
(#{sm.id}, #{sm.mobile}, #{sm.sendMsg},#{sm.sendStatus},#{sm.retMsg},#{sm.smChannelType}, #{sm.createTime}, #{sm.modifyTime}, #{sm.operator},#{sm.smSource})
